section.p: By the time the ship has reversed course, the poor surgeon is no longer in sight. ‘He’s been swept away to the sea gods’ hall,’ says the bosun in a voice of great lament.
‘What will we do without a surgeon?’ says the second mate. ‘Now I’ll have to wait till we get to Dweomer to get my hair cut.’
